Message.Title: privacy martyr Snowden fleas to Moscow
Message.Msg: (I hope he lectures the Russians on their immoral espionage activities. Funny he deals with people as nasty as commies in china and Russia, isn't it? ....) Edward Snowden left for Moscow on Sunday and his final destination may be Cuba, Ecuador, Iceland or Venezuela, according to various reports.

Message.Title: Dead Being Billed for Life Insurance (insurers must repay $763 million ) (and no fox whining??)
Message.Msg: (and some people want private insurers in charge of healthcare?......where is the Faux news whining on the incompetency of the free market?) Dead Being Billed for Life Insurance Life insurance for the dead? In a plot that might have been conceived by Fred MacMurray and George A. Romero, the nation's leading insurance companies continued billing customers for life insurance long after they were dead. The companies--including such household names as AIG, Hartford, John Hancock, Met Life, Prudential, Transamerica and TIAA-CREF-- have agreed to a multi-state settlement under which they will repay some $763 million owed the heirs of the deceased.

Message.Msg: I would not bet against Larry

Repubs got nothin and Dems got some nice fresh human feces to sell you. That puts them in the catbird seat. Of course, once the feces has been out in the sun a few days it might not have as much public relations value.

You have a choice. Operant conditioning suggests that ANY response will induce more posts. Consistently ignoring him will eventually cause his behavior to cease after perhaps an extinction burst after which extinction will occur.
Same applies to dumbbuttuuuuuuu.

Got that right. The ones that really control the U.S. put a new front man out for the people from time to time with a different label. But, they all follow their bosses dictates or they end up like Kennedy and others.

I knew a very "liberal" young man once. His dad ran a small local newspaper and was in with "Moonbeam" Brown's father in CA. I talked to him at length and believe I actually got him to see how wrong he was. Some time later he visited Turkey and was caught with marijuana and put in prison. I was really sorry as I felt he was really trying to come up with truth. Don't know what happened to him after that. I will say though that the so called "right" are under many illusions too. They fell for the "Big Lie" about Iraq and Saddam. There are people running both parties that ARE NOT interested in America's well being but only in their goal of ruling the world.

Topic.Title: Dead Being Billed for Life Insurance (insurers must repay $763 million ) (and no fox whining??)

Message.Msg: You want government running it? Hey, they give you endless undeclared an illegal wars that channel trillions of dollars to the military industrial complex. I've heard a story that volunteer firefighters that worked on Arizona's fires last year STILL haven't been paid. I had cataract surgery over six months ago. I was supposed to get a small rebate from the U.S. on my new reading glasses. I have yet to see it. Yes, it's bad when thieves run corporations but it's much worse when they run government. I'm a disabled vet and can't get to see a VA doctor here in less than a year. I was told that in an emergency I would first go to a private hospital and then apply for admission to the VA Hospital. Many others are in the same boat. I would like to know who paid life insureance fees to them after the death of the insured.

Message.Title: ORCL and CRM partnership vs. SAP
Message.Msg: Both ORCL and CRM have the skilled workers that SAP lacks. The challenge for SAP and their enterprise products is companies do not want to invest in hiring and training new staffs, while ORCL and CRM products have trained workers with a lot of experience. I don't know where Microsoft fits in unless, SQL Server is sold to Oracle and if that is the case, it will be huge.

Message.Msg: Set at four percent, low for American industries. Medicare fraud per year is set at 48 billion per year, four times the profit of insurance companies. And our govt is trying to take over our health care? Abyss just around the corner.
